name: healthcare-modelcard-monorepo
description: Monorepo for Healthcare Model Card Generator

scripts.setup: npm install && cd packages/schema && npm install && npm run build && cd ../../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: npm install && cd packages/schema && npm install && npm run build && cd ../../frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: cd packages/schema && npm run build && cd ../../frontend && npm run dev
